title: IPT Emission MOP Community Code
description: Comprehensive toolkit for modeling UV and optical emission spectra from the Io Plasma Torus (IPT). Supports volume emission rate calculations and line-of-sight integration through 3D plasma models using pre-calculated tables from the CHIANTI 11.0.2 atomic database. Includes Python, IDL/GDL, and Fortran implementations for the Magnetospheres of Outer Planets (MOP) research community.
